modName: Eragon Total Conversion Mod - Recruiting New Team Members
descriptionHtml:
Hello, I\'m ElSte17 and you might know me from a few of my mods, such as Flyable Dragon Races.

We are actually recreating the world of Alagaesia based on the books, not just Eragon, in case the title was confusing.

I am here representing the Alagaesia Creation Group, where I am the Lead 3D Artist.

We have high demand for new team members right now, as we are going through a total re-organization of the team and trying to bring in fresh talent!

Please, if you have experience in 3D modeling, quest writing, city building, drawing, etc., contact me via PM right away!  

If you want to join the group, make things faster and send an example (in your PM) of something you\'ve worked on that demonstrates your skill in the particular task you are trying to help with!

Please, if you plan to join our group, make sure you wont be one of those people who will become inactive after a few weeks.  We want enthusiastic and determined new members!
author: ElSte17
